summary: A small but mighty basement for breezehome.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================================

 Breezehomes Basement

small but mighty
a basement only for breezehome located in Whiterun
walkable through a trapdoor
enjoyable also for companions
some decorations upstairs, hopefully functional
all weapon racks, mannequins and book shelves are empty
maybe with adoptions in the future, regarding your ideas
 
 by EVALON
==================================================================================

If you like it, an endorsement would be much appreciated!
==================================================================================

If you want the poses as seen in my pictures for your own follower, you have to install the mod \"Followers can Relax\" by King Coin:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504 .

================================================================================

Installation:
Please drag and drop the *.esp file into the Data folder of your Skyrim directory where \"TESV.exe\" is located, activation will be automatically.

Removal:
Just delete the .esp file from your Data folder.
================================================================================
version 1.2.1:
added two playerhousechests to the basement,
delete double mannequin due beta version of skyrim
================================================================================
version 1.2:
added an additional mannequin upstairs
================================================================================
version 1.1:
added an additional book shelf and little clipping corrections
================================================================================
version 1.02:
the name of the esp-file was wrong, I forgot the \"s\", so there might be problems with the version 1.01
================================================================================
version 1.01:
the strongbox has an owner: player, to be opened by breezehome key
author: EVALON
